QuestData.Title: Give Them Peace
QuestData.Description: I overheard. Our secret is out, then.$b$bWhen I learned that the mantid had burrowed beneath our temple, I reacted hastily. I sent dozens of guardians to defend what they could, but they were not prepared. They succumbed to fear, and never returned.$b$bA pandaren deserves to die embracing the ground, as he does in sleep... not flat on his back with his eyes transfixed in terror. Please, $n. Give them the peace they deserve.
QuestData.LogDescription: Give peace to 10 Fear-Stricken Sentinels by closing their eyes and placing them on their bellies.
QuestData.CompletionText: I should have gone with them.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $c.$b$b<Qipan sighs.>$b$bI should have been among them.
